people_also_ask.question: How long is Elder Scrolls 3 Morrowind?
people_also_ask.heading: about 44½ Hours
people_also_ask.heading2: When focusing on the main objectives, The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind is about 44½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 330 Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind? | HowLongToBeat

people_also_ask.question: Can you still play Morrowind?
people_also_ask.heading: Ultimately, Morrowind is still a fantastic game in 2021 as long as players understand that it's a completely different experience from other Elder Scrolls games, and are willing to be patient with its retrospective faults.17-Mar-2021
people_also_ask.title: Is Morrowind Still Fun to Play in 2021? - Game Rant

people_also_ask.question: Is Morrowind free on Bethesda?
people_also_ask.heading: Those who log into Bethesda.net today can claim a free copy of Morrowind by using the code TES25TH-MORROWIND. ... Bethesda is also encouraging fans to post their creations on Twitter using the hashtag #TES25. So far it's mainly memes, what a surprise.26-Mar-2019

attributes.value: todd howard, ken rolston, mark nelson

knowledge_panel.description: the elder scrolls iii: morrowind is an open-world action role-playing video game developed by bethesda game studios and published by bethesda softworks. it is the third installment in the elder scrolls series, following 1996's the elder scrolls ii: daggerfall, and was released in 2002 for microsoft windows and xbox. wikipedia
